query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 «Chi è costui che ’l nostro monte cerchia 2 prima che morte li abbia dato il volo, 3 e apre li occhi a sua voglia e coverchia?».
query.error: **English:** 1 "Who is this who circles our mountain 2 before death has given him flight, 3 and opens and closes his eyes at will?".
query.result: 1 "Siapakah gerangan orang ini yang mengelilingi gunung kita 2 sebelum kematian memberinya kesempatan untuk terbang, 3 dan membuka serta menutup matanya sesuka hatinya?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 «Non so chi sia, ma so ch’e’ non è solo; 5 domandal tu che più li t’avvicini, 6 e dolcemente, sì che parli, acco’lo».
query.error: **English:** 4 "I do not know who he is, but I know that he is not alone; 5 you ask him, who are closer to him, 6 and gently, so that he speaks, greet him."

query.prompt:

query.prompt:

13 onde vieni e chi se’; ché tu ne fai 14 tanto maravigliar de la tua grazia, 15 quanto vuol cosa che non fu più mai».

query.result: 13 dari mana kamu berasal dan siapa kamu; karena kamu membuat kami 14 sangat kagum dengan rahmatmu, 15 sebagai sesuatu yang belum pernah terlihat sebelumnya."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 E io: «Per mezza Toscana si spazia 17 un fiumicel che nasce in Falterona, 18 e cento miglia di corso nol sazia.
query.error: **English:** 16 And I: "Through half of Tuscany it spreads, 17 a little stream that springs in Falterona, 18 and a hundred miles of its course do not satisfy it.
query.result: 16 Dan aku: "Melalui separuh Tuscany ia mengalir, 17 sungai kecil yang bermula di Falterona, 18 dan seratus mil alirannya tidak memuaskannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Di sovr’ esso rech’ io questa persona: 20 dirvi ch’i’ sia, saria parlare indarno, 21 ché ’l nome mio ancor molto non suona».
query.error: **English:** 19 Above it I saw this person: 20 to tell you who I am would be to speak in vain, 21 for my name is not yet widely known.
query.result: 19 Di atasnya kulihat orang ini: 20 untuk memberitahumu siapa aku, itu akan sia-sia, 21 karena namaku belum banyak dikenal.

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 «Se ben lo ’ntendimento tuo accarno 23 con lo ’ntelletto», allora mi rispuose 24 quei che diceva pria, «tu parli d’Arno».
query.error: **English:** 22 "If your understanding is embodied 23 with intellect," then he who spoke before replied to me, 24 "you are speaking of the Arno."
query.result: 22 "Jika pemahamanmu diwujudkan 23 dengan intelek," maka orang yang berbicara sebelumnya menjawabku, 24 "kamu sedang berbicara tentang Arno."

query.prompt:

query.error: **English:** 25 And the other said to him: "Why did 26 this one hide the name of that river, 27 just as one does with horrible things?".
query.result: 25 Dan yang lainnya berkata kepadanya: "Mengapa 26 orang ini menyembunyikan nama sungai itu, 27 seperti yang dilakukan orang terhadap hal-hal yang mengerikan?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
